question: What is the objective of recently launched SIS-DP project?
option1: To help DRDO in critical defence projects related to space
option2: To aid gram panchayat in planning and implementation of developmental activities
option3: To help in mitigation of climate change impacts on Indian Agriculture
option4: To provide certain services to India\'s neighbouring countries
answer: To aid gram panchayat in planning and implementation of developmental activities
explanation: The SIS- DP project was recently launched by the ISRO. SIS-DP is Space based Information Support for Decentralised Planning. Apart from this project, the Bhuvan Panchayat V 3.0 web portal was launched at the national workshop on SISDP update in Bengaluru. The SIS-DP project is to aid gram panchayat in planning and implementation of developmental activities and also their monitoring by giving inputs derived from satellite data. The current project, SISDP update is based on the success of the previous SISDP phase- I that ended in 2016-17.
